title: Flex Mentallo - Man of Muscle Mystery.cbz
description:
Your loins quiver as Flex Mentallo flexes to access the power of the Bodymind!

"HERO OF THE BEACH!"

Flex Mentallo comes from the pages of Grant Morrison's Doom Patrol and is loosely based on the idea of a single page advert created by Charles Atlas. It was meant to sell a book of muscle building techniques.

Morrison turns this around into a homoerotic psychedelic mystery caper where Flex Mentallo has to save his creator, Wally Sage. Or is he a figment of Wally Sage's imagination concocted to save himself from a drug overdose?

Digitally derived copy, not a scan.
